trans-unit.source: Represents the size of a font.
trans-unit.target: 表示字型的大小。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to change the style properties for multiple controls at one time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>變更一次指定多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Each time one of the `Style` property values changes, each control must call its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ApplyStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每次的其中一個`Style`屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ApplyStyle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Not all the controls included in this example support all the properties that are demonstrated.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中所包含的不是所有控制項都支援示範的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor recognizes the strings for `value` that are shown in the following table to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A>建構函式可辨識的字串`value`如下表中建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>類別。

trans-unit.source: String value
trans-unit.target: 字串值

trans-unit.source: `xx-small`, `xxsmall`
trans-unit.target: `xx-small`, `xxsmall`

trans-unit.source: `x-small`, `xsmall`
trans-unit.target: `x-small`, `xsmall`

trans-unit.source: `x-large`, `xlarge`
trans-unit.target: `x-large`, `xlarge`

trans-unit.source: `xx-large`, `xxlarge`
trans-unit.target: `xx-large`, `xxlarge`

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property has the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性具有值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.NotSet>。

trans-unit.source: The string comparison is case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 字串比較是不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For all other values of `value`, a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class is created by treating `value` as a font size and setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他值`value`的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>類別由視為`value`為字型大小和設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType.Point>。

trans-unit.target: 表示空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: No HTML rendered output is created when this field is used.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位用時，會不建立任何 HTML 呈現的輸出。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含要與這個執行個體比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equivalent to the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否等於呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equivalent to the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> class that this method is called from; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 等於呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 類別的執行個體，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Equals%2A> method to determine whether the specified <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType> is equivalent to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Equals%2A>方法，以判斷是否指定<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>相當於執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>從呼叫這個方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: For the specified <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType> to be equivalent, the object must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> that contains the same values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> properties as the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>為相等，此物件必須是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>，其中包含相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>屬性執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>從呼叫這個方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the font size has been set.

trans-unit.target: 如果字型的大小尚未設定，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.IsEmpty%2A>屬性來判斷是否已設定的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> property set to <see langword="FontSize.Large" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="FontSize.Large" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Large> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Large`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Large>欄位來表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為`FontSize.Large`。

trans-unit.source: In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Large"`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯輸出所含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:Large"`。

trans-unit.source: In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="5">`.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0，HTML 轉譯輸出是`<font size="5">`。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> property set to <see langword="FontSize.Larger" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that contains the culture to represent the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，包含表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object to a string representation, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" />，將 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件轉換成字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object in the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: 指定文化特性中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A> method to retrieve the string representation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> in the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A>方法來擷取的字串表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>中指定的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為`FontSize.AsUnit`，傳回的字串是等值字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為任何其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize>值，傳回的字串是等值字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize>值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> that supplies culture-specific formatting information, which is used if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> property is set to the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit" /> value; otherwise, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 提供文化特性特定格式資訊的 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />，在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> 屬性被設定為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit" /> 值時使用，否則忽略。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式提供者，將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 物件轉換成對等字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" />, with any numeric unit value in the format specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" />，包含由 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 指定之格式的任何數字單位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A> method to retrieve the string representation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object using a culture-specific format provider for any numeric values that are in the string.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A>方法來擷取的字串表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件使用的特定文化特性的格式提供者的字串中的任何數字值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the unit value that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit>值，傳回的字串是對等的字串中包含的單位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The numeric portion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> value is formatted using the specified `formatProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 數字部份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>值會指定使用格式化`formatProvider`。

trans-unit.source: In other words, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value, the returned string representation is generated using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the unit object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit>使用產生的值，傳回的字串表示法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>單元物件儲存在上的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為任何其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize>值，傳回的字串是等值字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize" /> enumeration value that represents the font size.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示字型大小的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> enumeration value that represents the font size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize>列舉值，表示字型的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the font size.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示字型大小的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> object that specifies the font size.
trans-unit.target: 指定字型大小的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the font size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示字型大小。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> property set to <see langword="FontSize.XLarge" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="FontSize.XLarge" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XLarge> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XLarge>欄位來表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為`FontSize.XLarge`。

trans-unit.source: In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:X-Large"`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯輸出所含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:X-Large"`。

trans-unit.source: In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="6">`.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0，HTML 轉譯輸出是`<font size="6">`。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> object with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> property set to <see langword="FontSize.XSmall" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="FontSize.XSmall" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XSmall> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XSmall`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XSmall>欄位來表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>屬性設定為`FontSize.XSmall`。

trans-unit.source: In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:X-Small"`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯輸出所含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:X-Small"`。

trans-unit.source: In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="2">`.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0，HTML 轉譯輸出是`<font size="2">`。
